channel.title: Matheus Albuquerque
channel.description: Developer, speaker, creator. Obsessed with performance and DX.

item.title: How expensive is Prague?
item.description: A Latino perspective on renting, healthcare, groceries, and pretty much everything when it comes to the cost of living in the Czech capital.
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)

item.title: 2022 Wrapped: Communities, Public Speaking, and Other DevRel Stuff From a Non-DevRel Engineer
item.description: It’s that epiphany time of the year, again! But, before, a bit of an introduction!
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)

item.title: Jheniffer was always my favorite color
item.description: I hope yall don't mind the inconvenience, but I need to talk about Jheniffer Rodrigues.
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)

item.title: Driving towards a universal navigation strategy in React
item.description: When I joined STRV, they had a specific request for me; to build a front-end app for iOS, Android, and Web, sharing component and business logic amongst all the platforms.
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)

item.title: It's all about trusting the magic of beginnings
item.description: After almost two years immersed in countless exciting challenges, it's time to move on.
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)

item.title: A Whole Day Playing with IPFS
item.description: This is mostly a controversial decentralized web technologies research story but, before starting, there are a few things I'd like to ensure you all, my beloved readers, are aware of.
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)

item.title: Swift In The Sky With Types
item.description: ... Ou apenas mais uma conversa sobre linguagens, compiladores, tipos e... Swift!

item.title: O que há de novo com o AngularJS?
item.description: Mudanças anunciadas na ng-Europe, a versão 1.3, “morte” de APIs… O AngularJS 2.0 ainda será o AngularJS que conhecemos?
item.author: matheus@albuquerque.dev (Matheus Albuquerque)
